findings.title: Escrow.sol - Deviation from specifications
findings.description: Not all ERC-20 tokens return true on successful transfer, which can cause issues when using non-compliant tokens for funding trades. If such a token is used to fund a trade, it will be stuck in the escrow contract forever.

findings.title: Renounce Ownership
findings.description: The contract includes the renounceOwnership function which increases the attack surface unnecessarily as there are no specified situations for renouncing ownership.
